content: Go to work, send your kids to school. Follow fashion, act normal, walk on the pavements, watch TV. Save for your old age. Obey the law. Repeat with me: I am free.
translations: ita:Vai a lavorare, manda i tuoi figli a scuola. Segui la moda, agisci normalmentee, cammina sui marciapiedi, guarda la TV
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by wallebot (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
